H0.text: Which force were defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon in 490BC. Spartans

H1.text: Which force were defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon in 490BC. Thebans

H2.text: Which force were defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon in 490BC. Corinthians

H3.text: Which force were defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon in 490BC. Persians

A4.text: The Greek army inflicted a crushing defeat on the more numerous Persians

A5.text: The battle was fought between the citizens of Athens, aided by Plataea, and a Persian force commanded by Datis and Artaphernes
